Description: Is connected content used logically across the website?
Are content blocks used to highlight popular products and categories?
Are content blocks used to highlight promotional and/or marketing activities?
Are these used on the Homepage?
Are these used on PLP's?
Are these used on PDP's?
Are the right amount of filter options given?
Are all filters relevant?
Can the user select at least one value from every attribute?
Are filters being used for their true purpose, and not instead of subcategories/collections?
Are all important filter options captured?
Can the user select multiple values for at least one attribute?
Are they intuitive?
Is there an 'apply filters' button?
Does the filter menu close as soon as the user selects a value?
Do filter options indicate how many products correspond to that filter?
If available, is the process and outcome relevant?
Is guided selling available for all relevant products?
Are specific landing pages available for all main terms?
Are these optimised for SEO purposes?
Is a load more button present at the bottom of the list?
Are all the 'sort by' options needed?
Do all 'sort by' options make sense to a customer?
Are some or all of the sort by options true to purpose, and not attributes that should instead be on filters?
Is the URL of the paginated pages SEO optimised?
Is the appropriate list/grid view option enabled?
Does the site use infinite scrolling?
Does the site use pagination?
Does the site use the load ALL button at the bottom of the list?
Does the product listing page specify how many products are in this category/collection?
When using pagination/'load more' button, does the URL change?
Are recommendations shown on the homepage?
Are recommendations shown on PLP's?
Are recommendations shown on PDP's?
Are recommendations  shown in the checkout flow with an option to quick add to cart?
Are recommendations AI driven?
Are recommendations different and personalised for each user?
Are recommendations shown differently for when a user is logged into their account?
Is the recommendation selection relevant?
Are there no more than 50 products returned from the search query?
Are natural language and mispells recognised?
Does the search preview render quickly with both text & images?
Are results relevant and personalised for the user?
Are support, content and other CMS pages surfaced within search?
Are alternative languages recognised? (where applicable)
Does search provide pro-active suggestions when the user clicks inside the box?
Are available stock/products prioritised ahead of back order / or OOS product?
Does the search landing page render quickly and with relevant results?
Is the number of search results listed on the landing page?
Are filters/sort and other browsing features enabled on the search landing page?
Is the search box prominent on the page?
Is the information hierarchy logical for the customer?
Are all options/elements within the mega menu shown above the fold?
Are account & registration, wishlist & cart all accessible from the header?
Are 'shopping' options separate from customer service & content options within the mega menu?
Are menu options listed by most popular, followed by an alphabetical logic?
Is the mega menu clear and well formatted?
Are there no more than 3 layers of categories & subcategories within the menu?
On desktop, is the mega menu responsive on hover?
Are UGC images used across the site?
Is feedback reviewed regularly by the business?
Is customer service feedback collated, discussed internally, and used to improve products & service?
Are service reviews collected?
Is review feedback discussed internally and used to improve products & processes?
Are we collecting and displaying both positive & negative reviews?
Is social feedback collected and reviewed?
Is postcode/address lookup available?
Is the checkout flow logical, clear and quick?
If customer is logged in, is their information automatically filled at checkout?
Is there a guest checkout option?
Are social logins available at checkout?

Does the confirmation contain a request for feedback?

Does this contain details for customer service?
Does this contain social share prompts?

Are one-click payment methods available?

Are prices all inclusive of any relevant tax, duty and admin charges?
Is multi-currency available?
Are all relevant security certificates in place?
Is the padlock icon shown alongside the URL?

Are SLA's clearly defined, and met by the customer service team?
